styles.table: width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse; margin: 20px 0; font-size: 18px; text-align: left;
styles.th: background-color: #333; color: white; padding: 10px; border: 1px solid #ddd;
styles.livee: display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; text-decoration: none; color: inherit; margin: 5px 0; padding: 5px; border: 2px solid #000; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; transition: box-shadow 0.3s ease; background-color: red; color: white;
styles.liveeName: flex: 2; text-align: center; color: white; font-weight: bold;
